title: About Panacea Medcare
subtitle: Your trusted partner in global healthcare
heading: About Us
intro: Panacea Medcare is a premier medical tourism company based in Delhi NCR, India, with a distinguished track record spanning over 12 years. Specializing in providing Affordable and world-class healthcare services to international patients, Panacea Medcare has established itself as a leader in the industry.
points: Panacea Medcare is a premier medical tourism company based in Delhi NCR, India, with a distinguished track record spanning over 12 years. Specializing in providing Affordable and world-class healthcare services to international patients, Panacea Medcare has established itself as a leader in the industry.
A Professional organization which understands and takes care of the needs of a traveling patient with a total medical experience of over 50 years.
The company's patient-centric philosophy emphasizes personalized care, with tailored treatment plans that address the unique needs and preferences of each patient.
A Comprehensive solution provider who helps in satisfying all needs, "Quality, Financial, Psychological and Logistics"
A trustworthy, reliable and dependable partner.
We also help clients experience the rich natural and cultural and historical facets of India.

sumiitGupta.name: Mr. Sumiit Gupta
sumiitGupta.title: Founder Director
sumiitGupta.description: With over 30 years of diverse and rich experience in production, manufacturing, operations, logistics, purchase, projects, commercial, and finance, I am a seasoned corporate executive who can handle complex and challenging business scenarios. I have a strong engineering and business management background, with a PGDBM in Materials and Finance and a BTech degree.
sumiitGupta.roles: As the Director at Panacea Medcare, I am passionate about helping people get affordable and quality medical treatment in India. As Director, Athena Land & Real Estate, I leverage my extensive domain knowledge and expertise in land aggregation, industrial real estate, government liaisoning and approvals to handle land acquisition for corporates across India. I also serve as the Director of Business Development for Famsun Storage Co. Ltd. China, where I offer complete silo storage and material handling solutions for the grain and feed mill industry. I am passionate about revolutionizing the food grain storage infrastructure in India and creating value for my clients and stakeholders.

drPrerna.name: Dr. Prerna
drPrerna.title: M.D Nephrology
drPrerna.description: Dr. Prerna has Bachelor of Medicine and Surgery degree and MD- Nephrology and a Transplant Expert, with over 16 years of experience.
qualifications: She has a certification from the American Board of Internal Medicine.
She has taught extensively in University of Illinois, University of Iowa Hospitals and Clinic and completed a fellowship in Transplant Nephrology.
She has also worked at the Albert Einstein College of Medicine New York for several years.
She has extensive Research experience and has published number of Papers in Medical Journals,
She is also into Reiki healing and Energy Medicine.

drDeepika.name: Dr. Deepika
drDeepika.title: Ayurveda and Holistic Medicine
drDeepika.experience: Dr. Deepika has over 22 years of experience in the field of Ayurveda with a degree in Ayurvedic Medicine
drDeepika.aboutAyurveda: Ayurveda, India's holistic, integrated, physiotherapeutic medical system is based upon the universal natural law of balancing the five elements (ether, air, fire, water and earth) that make up the physical body.
drDeepika.aboutClinic: Dr Deepika operates her Wellness Clinic under the name of Sanovide which is a 100% natural health clinic based on therapies & techniques of ancient Indian medical system. This included combining best elements from the great ancient texts of Ayurveda & Yoga with modern research based nutrition to provide treatments & therapies best suited in today's fast paced life. The legacy of researching inter-relation between human body & nature lays the foundation of Sanovide.
treatments: Panchakarma - Detoxification and purification of the body
Abhyanga - Ayurvedic Massage - Rejuvenation, relaxation, and improving circulation
Shirodhara - Mental relaxation, stress relief, and treating insomnia
Swedana -Herbal Steam Therapy- Detoxification, relief from muscle stiffness, and promoting sweating
Udwarthanam - Weight loss, skin exfoliation, and improving skin tone
